about_the_game:
Koverpark Haunted Subway is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of an abandoned subway station that is haunted by the spirits of passengers and rail engineers who have lost their lives due to tragic accidents.

Koverpark Subway Station used to be a very busy location for passengers about a decade ago. There were a couple of tragic accidents that took place in the subway area of Koverpark, claiming the lives of hundreds of passengers and locomotive engineers. A few months after the incident, some paranormal activities were reported by the passengers. It had been reported that the laughing and growling sounds were often heard around the subway station area, and dark apparitions were also seen by some. Passengers often saw ghost trains passing by the station. Two years after the tragic accidents, all the railway services and operations for the Koverpark subway were suspended, and the station has been abandoned to date. Now, it has become one of the best paranormal locations, attracting various paranormal investigators and enthusiasts from all over the world. Also, these stories have inspired a lot of paranormal investigators and enthusiasts to check out the place, and the subway is so haunted that none of them were able to investigate the location even for a few minutes. 

You play as Jason, the paranormal enthusiast, and your mission is to explore the Koverpark haunted subway in order to experience the paranormal. Are you ready to experience the paranormal activities in the subway?

Key Features:

  • Explore the Koverpark subway station area!
  • Come face to face with the spirits of passengers, locomotive engineers and more!
  • Explore the control rooms, basement area!
  • Get a chance to see and ride a ghost train!
  • Collect items like keycards, train ticket etc.
  • Around half an hour of paranormal investigation.

Warning:

This game contains flashing lights which may not be suitable for people with epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.



Note: I am solo game developer and I have done all of the graphics, artwork, animation, design and programming except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.
